No internet connection:
Unable to connect to the Internet,
please try again after connecting...
menu.lang.help: 设置语言, 設定語言, Set language, 言語を設定する, 언어 설정, Establecer idioma, Установить язык, Sprache festlegen, Définir la langue, Definir idioma.
menu.timezone.help: Modify the system time zone settings.
menu.ra_hot.opt.0: Set the M/F key to Retroarch Hotkey Enable.
menu.ra_hot.opt.1: Set the SELECT key to Retroarch Hotkey Enable.
menu.rtgg.help:
In Retroarch games, press 'L2+R2+Down'
to pause the game and automatically display
the corresponding game guide. After the game is
finished, press the 'M' key to return to
0the paused point and continue playing..
menu.rtgg.opt.1:
Enable this feature. Tip: After enabling,
when you start the game, if available
game strategies are detected, a
vibration prompt will be displayed.
menu.shader.help:
Supports automatic adaptation of Retroarch
shaders, Shader parameters are preset
configurations of the magic modification system.
menu.shader.opt.0:
Disable shader features.
Shader features will be automatically
disabled when you launch the game.
menu.shader.opt.1:
Automatically apply preset shaders. When
starting a game, the shader configuration
will be automatically loaded based on the
preset of the modded system. Manual settings
are not supported.
menu.shader.opt.2:
Manually set shader functionality.
No changes will be made to shader settings when
starting a game, suitable for players who wish
to customize shader parameters themselves.
menu.bezel.help:
Supports automatic adaptation of emulator
bezels. Bezel files are stored
in '/mnt/mmc/anbernic/bezels'.
menu.bezel.opt.0:
Disable bezel functionality.
Bezel display will be automatically disabled
when starting a game. The game display ratio
defaults to 'core' (determined by the emulator core)
mode, and integer scaling is disabled.
menu.bezel.opt.1:
Automatically load preset bezels. When starting a game,
the default emulator bezel will be loaded based on
the settings in the configuration file 'default.cfg',
and corresponding screen ratio and integer scaling
parameters will be set. Manual settings are not supported.
menu.bezel.opt.2:
Manually set bezel functionality.
No changes will be made to bezel settings when
starting a game, suitable for players who wish
to customize bezel parameters themselves.
menu.led.help: Set the working mode of the power indicator light.
menu.led.opt.0:
Disable the power indicator light.
The power indicator light will automatically
turn off after system startup.
menu.led.opt.1:
Enable the power indicator light.
Normal working mode.
menu.led.opt.2:
Automatic working mode. The power indicator
light will automatically turn on when launching
the frontend, and turn off when launching
games or other software. Note: The light may
not display red when the battery is low.
menu.p_key.help:
Set the specific functionality when the power key
is pressed, such as standby or quick shutdown.
menu.p_key.opt.0:
When the power key is pressed,
the system enters low-power standby mode.
Note: For RG3xxxSP, the 'Standby Mode'
must be set to 'Super Standby' in system settings.
menu.p_key.opt.1:
When the power key is pressed,
the system will quickly shut down. If pressed
during a Retroarch emulator game, the game progress
will be automatically saved before shutting down.
The game progress will be restored upon the next boot.
menu.p_key.opt.2:
Combo key mode. Pressing the power key alone
enters standby mode, while pressing 'M + Power Key'
simultaneously enters quick shutdown mode.
menu.ra_com.help:
Use the L or R key to implement
combo key input functionality.
menu.ra_com.opt.0:
Pressing the R key is equivalent
to pressing 'A + B' simultaneously.
menu.ra_com.opt.1:
Pressing the R key is equivalent
to pressing 'A + Y' simultaneously.
menu.ra_com.opt.2:
Pressing the L key is equivalent
to pressing 'A + B' simultaneously.
menu.ra_com.opt.3:
Pressing the L key is equivalent
to pressing 'A + Y' simultaneously.
menu.ra_com.opt.4: Cancel setting, disable combo key functionality.
menu.ra_turbo.help:
Set the activation key for Retroarch's turbo
functionality. Usage: Set L3 as the activation key.
In-game, hold the A button and press L3 once
to activate the A button's turbo functionality.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.0:
Set button A as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.1:
Set button B as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.2:
Set button Y as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.3:
Set button X as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.4:
Set button L1 as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.5:
Set button R1 as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.6:
Set button L2 as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.7:
Set button R2 as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.8:
Set button L3 as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.9:
Set button R3 as the activation key
for Retroarch's turbo function.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.10:
Cancel setting. Players can manually
set the activation key for the turbo
function in Retroarch.
menu.dark.help: Significantly reduce the brightness of the game screen in the Retroarch emulator. It is suitable to be enabled when playing games in a dark environment at night.
menu.dark.opt.0: Turn off the night mode function.
menu.dark.opt.1: Turn on the night mode function. Note: The night mode is only suitable for the Retroarch emulator and is not applicable to the front-end and third-party emulators.
menu.varc.help:
Set the display orientation for
vertical arcade games (VARCADE).
Note: Some devices are not suitable for
vertical gameplay on a horizontal screen.
menu.varc.opt.0:
Horizontal screen, play vertical games
horizontally. Smaller display.
menu.varc.opt.1:
Horizontal screen, rotate vertical
game display by 90 degrees. Larger display, but
some devices may have inconvenient controls.
menu.aca.help:
If a game is not supported by the default
arcade core, automatically try other cores.
If successful, the successful core
will be recorded and automatically used the
next time the game is launched.
menu.aca.opt.1:
Enable this feature.
Note: This feature may conflict with 'Online Gaming'.
Please disable this feature before
playing online games.
menu.samba.help:
Enable file sharing over WIFI,
allowing direct access to the host's files
from a PC. Convenient for copying games,
saves, and other files.
menu.samba.opt.1:
Enable this feature. Usage: On the PC,
enter '\\(Host IP Address)' in the 'Address Bar' of
'File Explorer' to access the host's resources.
Note: Username: root, Password: root.
menu.samba.opt.2:
Temporarily enable, automatically disable after reboot.
Prevents connection failures caused by network
disconnection during auto-lock. Usage: On the PC,
enter '\\(Host IP Address)' in the 'Address Bar'
of 'File Explorer' to access the host's resources.
Note: Username: root, Password: root.
menu.ssh.help:
SSH is a protocol for secure remote login and other
secure network services over an insecure network.
menu.ssh.opt.1:
Enable this feature.
Note: Username: root, Password: root.
menu.ssh.opt.2:
Temporarily enable, automatically disable after
reboot. Prevents connection failures caused by
network disconnection during auto-lock.
Note: Username: root, Password: root.
menu.syn.help: Use Syncthing to sync games and saves between devices over the network.
menu.syn.opt.1:
Enable this feature, remains effective after exit.
Access via http://<Device IP Address>:8384
menu.syn.opt.2:
Temporarily enable, automatically disable after
reboot. Access via http://<Device IP Address>:8384
menu.font.help: Toggle between default and large font modes.
menu.font.opt.1:
Use large font.
Note: In large font mode, some interface text
may experience misalignment, overflow,
or other issues.
menu.p_lock.help:
Set the behavior for auto-lock when the
screen times out or when the RG3xxxSP lid is closed.
menu.p_lock.opt.0:
When the screen times out or the lid is closed,
the system enters low-power standby mode.
Note: For RG3xxxSP, the 'Standby Mode' must be
set to 'Super Standby' in system settings.
menu.p_lock.opt.1:
When the screen times out or the lid is closed,
the system will shut down quickly.
If in a Retroarch emulator game, it will save
the game progress before shutting down.
The game progress will be restored upon the next boot.
menu.p_hdmi.help:
Set whether to enter standby when HDMI
is connected and the screen times out
or the lid is closed (RG3xxxSP).
menu.p_hdmi.opt.0:
When HDMI is connected, the system enters
standby on screen timeout or lid close.
menu.p_hdmi.opt.1:
When HDMI is connected, the system does not
enter standby on screen timeout or lid close.
menu.als.help:
Configure whether to automatically load game
saves when starting a Retroarch game.
menu.als.opt.1:
Enable this feature.
Usage: When starting a game, it will
automatically load the existing save.
To skip loading, hold the 'A' button
while starting the game.
